II fldgi – wêlrK

iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 1050
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
1049- B 081220 — 353 (2017/10)

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
  fuu .eiÜ m;%h www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2017 fkdjeïn¾ ui 17 jeks Èk m< 
lrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2017 fkdjeïn¾ ui 02 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï 
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh bf,lafg%dksl 
iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

ie' hq' - m%dfoaYSh iNd ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2017 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 13 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ 
m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m< lrk ,§' 
ie' hq'-  (i)   2017'10'20 Èk m< jQ wxl 2"042 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  II fldgi m< fkdùh'
 (ii)   fujr m<jk .eiÜ m;%fha VI fldgfia 2017 j¾Ih i|yd fld<U wêlrK l,dmhg wh;a cQß iNslhskaf.a kdudj,shla 
NdId;%fhka u m<fõ'

uf.a wxlh (- fud' È' ufya wê' f,aNd$2017'
Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - fudrgqj
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha we;s ±kg jir mylg fmr wjika ù we;s my; Wmf,aLkfha ±lafjk kvq jd¾;d 2018 ckjdß 29 Èfkka 
miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;'
   02' tfyhska fuys my; Wmf,aLkfha ±lafjk kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrejl= ;udg wjYH kvqfõ iïmQ¾K 
úia;rhla fyda tys hï fldgila ,nd .ekSug wjYH fõ kï tA i|yd ,sÅ; b,a,Sula 2018 ckjdß ui 29 jeks Èkg fmr 
fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= fõ'
   03' tfia b,a,Sï bÈßm;a fkdjqkfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2018 ckjdß ui 29 jeks Èfkka miqj 
fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'

tfrysj meñ‚,slre fj; remsh,a mkia wg ,laI úis mkaoyia wgish myhs Y; mkia y;r ^re' 58"25"805'54$-& l uqo,la

m%ldYfha Èk isg ;Skaÿ m%ldYh l%shdfõ fhdojd tlS uqo, meñ‚,slre fj; f.jkq ,nk Èkh f;la" tlS uqo,a u; ffk;sl 
fmd<sho" iy wêlrKfha ks,Odßfhl= úiska ;lafiare lrk ,o kvq .dia;= o meñ‚,slreg f.jk f,ig ksfhda. lr we;s 
w;r" tlS f.ùï lsÍug fuu ú;a;slre wfmdfydi;a ù meyer yßkafka kï" tlS uqo, whlr meñ‚,slreg §u i|yd .re 
wêlrKfha 2013'11'20 Èke;s ksfhda.h m%ldrj isú,a kvq úOdk ix.%yfha 653 j.ka;sh m%ldrj ±kgu;a ;ykug f.k we;s 
my; m<uqjeks yd fojk Wmf,aLkhkays iúia;rj úia;r lr we;s ú;a;slreg wh;a ú;a;slref.a bvu m%isoaO fjkafoaisfha 
úlsŒug ksfhda. lr we;s fyhska"
   by; lS uqo,a ;Skaÿ m%ldYfha Èkfha isg udi folla ^02& we;=<; meñ‚,slreg f.úh hq;= njg yd tfia f.ùu 
meyer yer we;s neúka" fuys my; Wmf,aLkj, úia;r fldg we;s tlS bvï tys ysñlï wêlrKfha msial,a uÕska úlsŒfï 
fldkafoais u; m%isoaO fjkafoaisfha úl=Kk f,ig" jeäÿrg;a wd× lr we;s fyhska o"

úia;r lr we;s bvï foam<" tAjd msysá ia:dkfha § u j¾I 2017 fkdjeïn¾ ui 23 jeks  Èk m'j' 2'00 g ud úiska m%isoaO 
fjkafoaisfha úl=Kkq ,efí'
   ;j o" fuu m%isoaO fjkafoaisfha ,xiq ;nd foam< ñ,§ .kakd .eKqïlre fjkafoaisfha iïmQ¾K .eKqï uqo, fyda tu 
uqo,ska 25] lao" fjkafoais .dia;= yd rcfha .dia;= tu fjkafoaish wjika jQ jydu uqo,ska f.úh hq;= w;r" b;sß 75] Èk 30

   foam<g m%fõY ud¾.h'- fydrK isg w.=rejdf;dg mdf¾ ^l¿;r mdf¾& ls'ó' 2 la muK hk úg yuqjk ne,a,msáh

Wmf,aLkh
niakdysr m<df;a" l¿;r Èia;%slalfha rhs.ï fldarf<a uqxj;a; ndf.a m;a;=fõ uÿrdj, m%dfoaYSh iNd n,iSudj ;=< fõrj;af;a 
msysá —.ïueáfyak˜ 
fyj;a ±kg —fõrj;a; tiafÜÜ˜ f,i y÷kajkq ,nk bvug n,h,;a ñkskafodare Ô' wêldrï úiska j¾I 
2003 ckjdß ui 23 jeks Èk uek idok ,o wxl 1986 ork msUqf¾ f,dÜ wxl 07 ork fldgig n,h,;a ñkskafodare k,ska 
fyar;a úiska j¾I 2008 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 13 jeks Èk kej; uek idok ,o wxl 2509 msUqf¾ f,dÜ wxl 7A ork fldgig udhsï"
W;=rg  :  hij;S ú;dk" y|mdkaf.dvf.a udáka isxf[da" fyÜáj;a;f.a k,skodi" ví' pkaøfiak" ymq;ka;s%f.a 
ðkodi iy tia' tA' mSßia isxf[da hk whg wh;a bvu o" 
kef.kysrg  :  lkaoùk bvu iy lkaoùk l=Uqr o" 
ol=Kg  :  fndau¿j o" mS' isßmd," ú,aika fmf¾rd" mS' .=Kfiak iy mS' f,dl=fkdakd hk whg wh;a bvu o" 
ngysrg  :  m%dfoaYSh iNd mdr iy hij;S ú;dk hk whg wh;a bvu o"
   hk udhsï ;=< msysá wlalr oyhhs rEâ folhs m¾pia oYu ;=khs myla ^wla'10" rEâ'2" m¾'00'35& fyj;a fylaghd¾ 
4'2500 úYd, bvu iu. tA ;=< msysá mrK rn¾ j.dj iy wfkl=;a ish¿ foa iuÕ h'
   by; i|yka f,dÜ wxl 7A ork fldgi my; ±lafjk bvfuka kej; uek idok ,oaols'
fojk Wmf,aLkh
